Name: The Hee Bee Jee Bees
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A Margarita with a touch of honey vodka and agave enriched orange liqueur.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at The Cabinet Room, London, England and named after Julio Bermejo & Jacob Briars. Julio is a tequila ambassador and Jacob was promoting 42 Below honey vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of The Hee Bee Jee Bees contains 179 calories
